Name: Endless Furry Killer Infinity
About the game: Welcome to Endless Furry Killer Infinity! The 3rd installment of the 'Endless Furry Killer' Series! Key Features: 1. Shoot and kill furries! 2. Try to get the best score with only one life! 3. Three difficulty levels, Easy, Medium, Hard! 4. Five weapons, Four Guns. Sword, Pistol, Shotgun, Rifle, Plasma Gun! 5. Amazing Music! 6. Get Addicted To Furry Culture! 7. Steam Leaderboard! 8. Steam Achievements! 9. Seven Waves Per Level!
